rukus.text: 30|11|Arra wa mazu sozo o hajime, sorekara sore o kurikaeshi, sorekara anata gata o kare ni kisa reru.
30|12|(Shinpan no) toki ga torai suru hi,-zai no aru mono wa zetsubo surudearou.
30|13|Soshite kare-ra ga (ware ni) hai shita (kamigami no) nakaniha, kare-ra no tame ni torinasu mono mo naku, mata kare-ra mo, korera no hai shita mono-tachi o hinin suru.
30|14|(Shinpan no) toki ga torai suru sonohi ni wa,(subete no hito wa) chiri djiri ni sa rerudearou.
30|15|Sonotoki, zenko ni isoshinda mono wa, midori no nobe de, shiawaseni sa reyou.
30|16|Shinko o kyohi shi waga shirushi to raise de no (omo to no) kaiken o kyogidearu to shita mono wa, chobatsu ni fuse rareyou.
30|17|Sore de, yugure ni mata akatsuki ni, arra o tatae nasai.
30|18|Ten ni oite mo ji ni atte mo, eiko wa kare ni zokusuru. Gogo osoku ni, mata Ni~Tsu no katamuki hajime ni (arra o tatae nasai).
30|19|Kare wa,-shi kara nama o motarashi, mata nama kara shi o motarasa re, mata kare hateta daichi o yomigaera seru. Kore to onajiyoni anata gata mo hikidasa reru.
